text: “Gei goodou ala ne dubu i Judah hudee de hagalongo gi Dimaadua di godou God, hudee dagalili di noho i lodo tenua deenei. Goodou hudee helekai boloo, ‘Deeai, gimaadou e hula e noho i Egypt, i di gowaa dela hagalee tale gi tauwa, be e longono di hagailoo o tauwa, be e hiigai.’ Maa goodou ga helekai beenei, gei Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, di God o Israel, ga helekai, ‘Maa goodou ga haga mahi bolo goodou e hula hua e noho i Egypt,
